org.apache.giraph.worker

类 InputSplitPathOrganizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.worker.InputSplitPathOrganizer

  • public class InputSplitPathOrganizer
extends Object
    Utility class to extract the list of InputSplits from the ZooKeeper tree of "claimable splits" the master created, and to sort the list to favor local data blocks. This class provides an Iterator for the list the worker will claim splits from, making all sorting and data-code locality processing done here invisible to callers. The aim is to cut down on the number of ZK reads workers perform before locating an unclaimed InputSplit.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • InputSplitPathOrganizer

        public InputSplitPathOrganizer(ZooKeeperExt zooKeeper,
                       String zkPathList,
                       String hostName,
                       boolean useLocality)
                        throws org.apache.zookeeper.KeeperException,
                               InterruptedException
        Constructor
        参数:
        zooKeeper - the worker's ZkExt
        zkPathList - the path to read from
        hostName - the worker's host name (for matching)
        useLocality - whether to prioritize local input splits
        抛出:
        org.apache.zookeeper.KeeperException
        InterruptedException

      • InputSplitPathOrganizer

                       List<String> inputSplitPathList,
                       String hostName,
                       boolean useLocality)
        Constructor
        参数:
        zooKeeper - the worker's ZkExt
        inputSplitPathList - path of input splits to read from
        hostName - the worker's host name (for matching)
        useLocality - whether to prioritize local input splits
